attributes.action: make all national football matchs free to air and not pay per view.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: In the light of the World cup games which were pay to view, we should be able to watch the matches with out having to pay for them as they are the national teams.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
